plot: When a training exercise for D-Day goes awry, hundreds of US servicemen are plunged into the icy waters of the English channel. Desperate to survive they paddle to the first land in sight. ...
title: Cornfed Tiger
plot_es: When a training exercise for D-Day goes awry, hundreds of US servicemen are plunged into the icy waters of the English channel. Desperate to survive they paddle to the first land in sight. ...
